choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for 7 days.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
Here is a balanced and nutritious meal plan tailored to your dietary restrictions for seven days:

Day 1:
Breakfast: Green Smoothie - spinach, banana, apple, almond milk (use coconut or oat milk as an alternative)
Lunch: Grilled Chicken Salad with mixed greens, cucumber, tomatoes, and a homemade honey mustard dressing made without honey (you can use Dijon mustard instead)
Dinner: Baked Tofu with steamed vegetables like broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers
Snack 1: Roasted Chickpeas seasoned with your choice of spices or herbs
Snack 2: Fresh fruit salad without honey (use a non-dairy yogurt for dressing)

Day 2:
Breakfast: Overnight Oats - oats soaked in almond milk, topped with fresh berries and a drizzle of maple syrup or agave nectar
Lunch: Lentil Soup with crusty bread on the side
Dinner: Grilled Turkey Burger with avocado, tomato, and mixed greens on a bed of spinach
Snack 1: Roasted Nut Mix without almonds or cashews (try mixed nuts like walnuts, pecans, or pistachios)
Snack 2: Hummus with carrot sticks and cucumber slices

Day 3:
Breakfast: Chia Pudding - chia seeds soaked in coconut milk, topped with fresh fruit (use a non-dairy yogurt for dressing)
Lunch: Quinoa Salad with roasted vegetables and grilled chicken or tofu
Dinner: Baked Haddock with steamed asparagus and a lemon butter sauce made without honey (you can use Dijon mustard instead)
Snack 1: Roasted Seaweed Snacks seasoned with your choice of spices or herbs
Snack 2: Fresh fruit salad without honey (use a non-dairy yogurt for dressing)

Day 4:
Breakfast: Protein Shake - vanilla protein powder mixed with coconut milk and topped with fresh berries
Lunch: Chickpea Salad with mixed greens, cucumber, tomatoes, and a lemon tahini dressing made without honey (you can use Dijon mustard instead)
Dinner: Stuffed Bell Peppers with quinoa, black beans, corn, and avocado
Snack 1: Roasted Pumpkin Seeds seasoned with your choice of spices or herbs
Snack 2: Fresh fruit salad without honey (use a non-dairy yogurt for dressing)

Day 5:
Breakfast: Vegetable Omelette - filled with spinach, tomatoes, and onions
Lunch: Lentil Soup with crusty bread on the side
Dinner: Grilled Chicken or Turkey with a mixed greens salad and balsamic vinaigrette made without honey (you can use Dijon mustard instead)
Snack 1: Roasted Nut Mix without almonds, cashews, or pistachios (try mixed nuts like walnuts, pecans, or sunflower seeds)
Snack 2: Fresh fruit salad without honey (use a non-dairy yogurt for dressing)

Day 6:
Breakfast: Whole Grain Cereal with almond milk and mixed berries
Lunch: Greek Salad with marinated tofu or grilled chicken, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, and a homemade lemon-tahini dressing made without honey (you can use Dijon mustard instead)
Dinner: Baked Sweet Potato loaded with black beans, avocado, and salsa
Snack 1: Roasted Seaweed Snacks seasoned with your choice of spices or herbs
Snack 2: Fresh fruit salad without honey (use a non-dairy yogurt for dressing)

Day 7:
Breakfast: Protein Pancakes - made with protein powder, almond milk, and topped with fresh berries
Lunch: Chickpea Salad with mixed greens, cucumber, tomatoes, and a lemon tahini dressing made without honey (you can use Dijon mustard instead)
Dinner: Baked Tofu or Tempeh with steamed vegetables like broccoli, carrots, and bell peppers
Snack 1: Roasted Pumpkin Seeds seasoned with your choice of spices or herbs
Snack 2: Fresh fruit salad without honey (use a non-dairy yogurt for dressing)
